medium: Cotton, camelid fiber; plain weave with tapestry, discontinuous supplementary weft-patterning and embroidery
title: Border Fragment
description: Fragment of border with scrolls and bird motif in tan, yellow, white, pink, red, gray, and brown. Plain weave with tapestry, discontinuous supplementary weft-patterning and embroidery. Fringe attached on lower edge.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
